title: OpenProject Roadmap - Open Source Project Management Software
content: OpenProject Roadmap We continuously improve OpenProject. Discover OpenProject's strategic roadmap Just like our source code, we are making the development roadmap transparent to the public. It shows all topics that we have recently released, are currently working on, and are planning for the future. The roadmap is automatically generated and is updated regularly from our Community instance, where you will find more details to all topics on the roadmap. Please note that the timeline and feature set are subject to change as we continue to develop OpenProject. Our open source philosophy drives this process, and we strive to remain open and transparent throughout the journey. For more details on features and versions already released, take a look at our release notes. Roadmap We never stop improving OpenProject. See recently released features as well as upcoming features and improvements we are working on: 2025 Q1 Support for large number of projects list view for very large project portfolios   closed Additional calculation methods and advanced configuration options for project progress reporting   closed Scheduling mode "As soon as possible" to automatically reschedule successors   closed Generate
